mapper.select: select * from nc_course co where co.course_id not in (select ch.choose_course_id from nc_choose ch where ch.choose_student_id=#{studentId})
mapper.insert: insert into nc_record (record_id, record_course_id, record_deliver_id, record_deliver_name, record_receiver_id, record_receiver_name, record_message, record_time) values (#{record_id}, #{record_course_id}, #{record_deliver_id}, #{record_deliver_name}, #{record_receiver_id}, #{record_receiver_name}, #{record_message}, #{record_time})
mapper.select: select * from nc_record where (record_course_id = #{courseId} and record_deliver_id = #{deliverId} and record_receiver_id = #{receiverId}) or (record_course_id = #{courseId} and record_deliver_id = #{receiverId} and record_receiver_id = #{deliverId}) order by record_time
mapper.insert: insert into nc_forum (forum_id, forum_course_id, forum_user_id, forum_title, forum_content, forum_time) values (#{forum_id}, #{forum_course_id}, #{forum_user_id}, #{forum_title}, #{forum_content}, #{forum_time})
